text:
I've tried this coffee before at their other locations, and it's really disappointing. However, this branch is pretty good. The taste is clean, with no off-flavors or bad aftertastes, leaving a pleasant remaining flavour.

Their fries is also good along with the dipping sauce.

The customer service is very remarkable. The guy with a moustache, sorry idk his name 🙏🏻 is very good. He patiently explains their specialty and recommendations which shows he has the passion about coffee.

We are now consider a regular here. Good job

Amazing cafe for chilling and doing some work. However the staffs are ridiculously rude bad attitude.. especially the lady she so damn rude was yelling with at us , innocently we were asking for our coffee, the guy with the cap dealing with cashier my gosh.. rolling his eyes turning left and right no wanting to take any orders.. thank you aren’t his dictionary at all. Very poor staffs. If you are looking for a good service.. definitely not here.

Found this place after exiting Singapore via Tuas. Quite near to access. Signature coffee selection is nice. Tried their peanut butter latte and dirty latte.

Peanut butter latte: buttercream on top. Sweetness just nice to my palate. However the peanut butter taste is so little. But the base latte is good.

Dirty latte : now this is ace.

Laid back cafe atmosphere for coffee enthusiast to chill

Really not bad. Chill decor and environment. Food was good, coffee was good. And service was also good. Must try their peanut butter latte. Surprisingly good. Also try their lychee americano. Refreshing.

Lovely cosy atmosphere with friendly staffs! 🥰 the most important is the great food with special handmade coffee! 💛🫶🏻 truffle fries with spark your passion 特调咖啡 is a must to order!! ✨ remember take a pretty OOTD before you left!🙆🏻‍♀️
